citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:25 to 4:05
pm on 05-DEC-17.
Inspector arrived at 3:25 gate was closed, inspector called out for licensee, honked horn and call both listed
numbers and left messages.
